version_description:
Fix for keyboard bug on iOS8

Also:
- Updated with new words recently added to the dictionary, including "crowdfunding" and "hashtag"
- Added support for custom URL schemes
- Fixed Word of the Day display issue

Fix for keyboard bug on iOS8

Also:
- Updated with new words recently added to the dictionary, including "crowdfunding" and "hashtag"
- Added support for custom URL schemes
- Fixed Word of the Day display issue

* Merriam-Webster Dictionary & Thesaurus is now available on Apple Watch.
* The Word of the Day is now accessible via the Today notification widget.

* Merriam-Webster Dictionary & Thesaurus is now available on Apple Watch.
* The Word of the Day is now accessible via the Today notification widget.

* Optimized for iPhone 6 and 6+
* Fixed display issues

* Optimized for iPhone 6 and 6+
* Fixed display issues
